actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation of property expropriated from citizens of the United States by foreign governments without payment of adequate compensation.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation of property expropriated from citizens of the United States by foreign governments without payment of adequate compensation.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of property expropriated from citizens of the United States by foreign governments without payment of adequate compensation.
